channel.title: TechEd Developers 2007 Videos Now Available
channel.description: At this years TechEd EMEA, they were doing a pilot recording video of the speakers along-side the usual audio/visual recordings that you get on your conference DVD's a few months after the event.  At an event such as this...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Dmytro Lapshyn+00:00
item.description:
It's a pity, though, that the videos are not downloadable. Not even with a stream capturing tool like SDP.
I don't mind the DRM per se, I'd just want to download the videos at work and then obtain a license from my home PC to be able to watch the videos at home.
item.dc:creator: Dmytro Lapshyn
